001package com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.utils;
002
003import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
004
005import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.claim.ClaimConstants;
006import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.types.Claim;
007import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.types.VerifiableCredential;
008import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.w3c.verifiableCredential.VerifiableCredentialGenerator;
009import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.types.ClaimKeys;
010import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.types.CredentialMatcherResult;
011import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.types.RequestedKey;
012
013import java.util.ArrayList;
014import java.util.Collections;
015import java.util.HashMap;
016import java.util.HashSet;
017import java.util.List;
018import java.util.Map;
019import java.util.Optional;
020import java.util.Set;
021import java.util.stream.Collectors;
022
023public class ClaimPresentationHelper {
024
025    private ClaimPresentationHelper() {
026        throw new IllegalStateException("Utility class");
027    }
028
029    public static List<VerifiableCredential> getVerifiableCredentialsFromClaim(@NonNull final Claim claim) {
030        final String jwtVc = claim.getOtherFormats().get(ClaimConstants.JWT_VC).toString();
031        if (jwtVc == null || jwtVc.isEmpty()) {
032            return Collections.emptyList();
033        }
034
035        return new VerifiableCredentialGenerator().fromString(jwtVc);
036    }
037
038    public static List<CredentialMatcherResult> getSharesForRequest(@NonNull final List<RequestedKey> requestedKeys, @NonNull final List<Claim> claims) {
039        Map<String, Set<String>> claimKeysMap = new HashMap<>();
040        for (RequestedKey key: requestedKeys) {
041            final String mapKey = Optional.ofNullable(key.getCardType()).orElse("");
042            Set<String> keySet = claimKeysMap.getOrDefault(mapKey, new HashSet<>());
043            keySet = keySet == null ? new HashSet<>() : keySet;
044            if (key.getCardKey() != null) {
045                keySet.add(key.getCardKey());
046            }
047            claimKeysMap.put(mapKey, keySet);
048        }
049
050        List<ClaimKey> claimKeys = claimKeysMap.entrySet().stream()
051                .map(entry -> new ClaimKey(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue(), new ArrayList<>()))
052                .collect(Collectors.toList());
053
054        for (ClaimKey claimKey: claimKeys) {
055            List<Claim> filteredClaims = claims;
056
057            if (!claimKey.requestedCardType.isEmpty()) {
058                filteredClaims = claims.stream().filter(claim -> {
059                    final String cardType = claim.getData().get(ClaimKeys.cardType);
060                    return cardType != null && cardType.equals(claimKey.requestedCardType);
061                }).collect(Collectors.toList());
062            }
063
064            if (claimKey.requestedCardKeys.isEmpty()) {
065                claimKey.addAllKeys = true;
066                claimKey.filteredClaims = filteredClaims;
067                continue;
068            }
069
070            for (String requestedCardKey: claimKey.requestedCardKeys) {
071                for (Claim claim : filteredClaims) {
072                    if (claim.getData().containsKey(requestedCardKey)) {
073                        claimKey.filteredClaims.add(claim);
074                    }
075                }
076            }
077        }
078
079        List<CredentialMatcherResult> results = new ArrayList<>();
080        for (ClaimKey claimKey: claimKeys) {
081            Set<String> keys;
082            if (claimKey.addAllKeys || claimKey.requestedCardKeys.isEmpty()) {
083                keys = new HashSet<>();
084                for (Claim claim: claimKey.filteredClaims) {
085                    keys.addAll(claim.getData().keySet());
086                }
087                keys.add(ClaimKeys.cardType);
088            } else {
089                claimKey.requestedCardKeys.add(ClaimKeys.cardType);
090                keys = claimKey.requestedCardKeys;
091            }
092            results.add(new CredentialMatcherResult(new ArrayList<>(keys), claimKey.filteredClaims));
093        }
094        return results;
095    }
096
097
098    private static class ClaimKey {
099
100        final String requestedCardType;
101        final Set<String> requestedCardKeys;
102        List<Claim> filteredClaims;
103        boolean addAllKeys = false;
104
105        public ClaimKey(@NonNull final String requestedCardType, @NonNull final Set<String> requestedCardKeys, @NonNull final List<Claim> filteredClaims) {
106            this.requestedCardType = requestedCardType;
107            this.requestedCardKeys = requestedCardKeys;
108            this.filteredClaims = filteredClaims;
109        }
110    }
111}
